name: RainyCity雨都
description:
It's a game telling about asian style cult. Your friend rainman will tell you the truth and you need to decide to keep secret or betray him.

Manual is in rar.

You can get my tool on itch : https://jingshing.itch.io/visualnovelmakers

You can get tool code on github : https://github.com/JingShing/Visual-Novel-Editor

一個有關於宗教的惡搞作品。對於台灣地理和神明的再創作。部分內容基於現實事件改編。

說明手冊(Manual)在rar中。

你可以在itch上獲得我的製作工具：https://jingshing.itch.io/visualnovelmakers

你可以在github上獲得我的工具代碼：https://github.com/JingShing/Visual-Novel-Editor

目前有簡繁中。
